skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The tempo of Uzelek's drumming increases, driving his allies into a state of furious combat prowess, enhancing their critical hit chance.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Marauder Horsemen units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: His presence on the battlefield bolsters the resilience of nearby allies, granting them increased defense against enemy attacks.
The chaotic rhythms of the Soulshaker disorient enemies, causing them to suffer penalties to accuracy and coordination.
He sets a relentless marching pace for his allies, increasing their movement range on the campaign map.
Zar Uzulek beats a defiant rhythm on his drum, granting nearby allies increased combat effectiveness and resilience as they make their final stand against overwhelming odds.

effects.description:
Income from post-battle loot: +30% when fighting against Cathayan factions
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Uzelek unleashes a booming rallying cry, rallying wavering allies and restoring their morale.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Marauder Horsemen units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: The Zar's drumming disrupts the flow of magic, causing enemy spellcasters to struggle to maintain their spells.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Many are the dark horrors of twisted flesh and nightmares made real that the Ruinous Powers have visited upon the world, but few are quite as vicious.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Don't go anywhere near its mouth - in fact, don't even get within snapping distance if you value your limbs.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Blink and you die.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

items.colour_text: Zar Uzelek's drum is known as the Soulshaker, a massive instrument crafted from the tanned hide of a great beast, adorned with chaotic symbols and etchings that seem to writhe and pulse with dark energy.The Soulshaker is a towering instrument, its surface scarred and weathered from countless battles. When Zar Uzulek strikes it, the sound reverberates across the battlefield like a rolling thunderstorm, instilling both dread and exhilaration in those who hear its primal call.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -5
	(enemy armies in local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Uzelek's rhythmic chants inspire loyalty and determination in the mighty Yusak's as much as they strike fear in those who oppose him.

effects.description:
Double experience gain for units when fighting against Cathayan factions
	(Hero's army)
